title: Adventure & Comfort

questions.text: For us, adventure together looks like...
choices: Exploring somewhere completely new and unknown
Trying new things in places we're comfortable
Pushing ourselves to grow through shared challenges
Cozy experiences with just a hint of something new

questions.text: For a trip together, I'd be most excited to...
choices: Go somewhere neither of us has been and figure it out
Explore local food, culture, and hidden gems
See the must-see sights and check things off the list
Relax somewhere beautiful without a packed itinerary

questions.text: When it comes to trying new things together, I hope we...
choices: Push each other to try stuff we'd never do alone
Encourage each other when the moment feels right
Balance new experiences with familiar comforts
Respect if one of us isn't feeling it

questions.text: If there's something exciting but a little scary (skydiving, a big move, a spontaneous trip), I'd want us to...
choices: Go for it - we've got each other!
Talk through the risks and decide together
One of us might need convincing from the other
Be honest if it's not something I'm ready for

questions.text: When one of us wants to try a new hobby or activity, I'd love it if we...
choices: Both dive in and try it together
Support each other even if only one is into it
Take turns trying each other's interests
Enjoy having some separate hobbies too

description: Find your balance between excitement and coziness together.
